fullplot: Quincy Watson, after being unceremoniously dumped by his fiancèe, pens a "how to" book on breaking up and becomes a best-selling author on the subject. Not wanting his male friends to suffer the same fate, he gives them advice on dumping their mates. A comedy of errors ensues.
plot: Inspired by his fiancèe (who dumped him), a man publishes a break-up hand-book for men, becoming a best-selling author in the process.
title: Breakin' All the Rules

tomatoes.consensus: This formulaic screwball comedy is weighed down by a contrived, overly complicated plot.
